question: Venkaiah Naidu announced a round-the-clock Doordarshan channel for this state.
explanation: The Union Information and Broadcasting Minister Venkaiah Naidu today announced a round-the-clock Doordarshan channel for Jharkhand. Jharkhand has been given the most film-friendly award by the National Film Awards. Special slots will be kept for Jharkhand through 'Doordarshan Bihar' till a full-fledged channel is launched.
